title: Topic 001 Question 784
body: A company deployed an Amazon EC2 instance last week A developer realizes that the EC2 instance is no longer running. The developer reviews a list of provisioned EC2 instances, and the EC2 instance is no longer on the list.
What can the developer do to generate a recent history of the EC2 instance?
options: Run Cost Explorer to identify the start time and end time of the EC2 instance
Use Amazon Inspector to find out when the EC2 instance was stopped
Perform a search in AWS CloudTrail to find all EC2 instance-related events
Use AWS Secrets Manager to display hidden termination logs of the EC2 instance
